channel.title: Data_set on mrgsolve
channel.description: Recent content in Data_set on mrgsolve

item.title: Generating input data sets for mrgsolve
item.description: library(mrgsolve) library(dplyr) Input data sets An important mechanism for creating robust, complex simulations is the input data set. Input data sets specify the population of individuals to simulate, including the number of individuals, each individual’s dosing interventions, each individual’s covariate values etc. The input data set is just a plain old R data.frame, but with some expectations about which columns are present and expectations for how to handle columns for certain names.
